title: betaSandwich: Robust Confidence Intervals for Standardized Regression Coefficients
text: Generates robust confidence intervals standardized regression coefficients using heteroskedasticity-consistent standard errors models fitted lm() described Dudgeon (2017: http://doi.org/10.1007/s11336-017-9563-z).

title: betaSandwich: Robust Confidence Intervals for Standardized Regression Coefficients

title: Robust Confidence Intervals for Standardized Regression Coefficients
text: example, multiple regression model fitted using overall rating (rating) regressand/outcome variable rest variables regressor/predictor variables using datasets::attitude data set (Chatterjee & Price, 1977). Robust confidence intervals standardized regression coefficients generated using BetaHC() function betaSandwich package following Dudgeon (2017).

title: Estimate Standardized Regression Coefficients and Robust Sampling Covariance Matrix — BetaHC
text: Estimate Standardized Regression Coefficients Robust Sampling Covariance Matrix

title: Estimate Standardized Regression Coefficients and Robust Sampling Covariance Matrix — BetaHC
Estimate Standardized Regression Coefficients and Robust Sampling Covariance Matrix — BetaHC
text: object Object class lm. type Character string. Correction type. Possible values "hc0", "hc1", "hc2", "hc3", "hc4", "hc4m", "hc5". g1 Numeric. g1 value type = "hc4m" type = "hc5". g2 Numeric. g2 value type = "hc4m". k Numeric. Constant type = "hc5"

title: Estimate Standardized Regression Coefficients and Robust Sampling Covariance Matrix — BetaHC
text: Returns object class betaSandwich list following elements: call Function call. type Standard error type. beta Vector standardized slopes. vcov Sampling covariance matrix standardized slopes. n Sample size. p Number regressors. df \(n - p - 1\) degrees freedom

title: Standardized Regression Slopes — coef.betaSandwich
text: Returns vector standardized regression slopes.

title: Standardized Regression Slopes — coef.betaSandwich
text: Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

title: Standardized Regression Slopes — coef.betaSandwich
code: object <- lm(rating ~ ., data = attitude) std <- BetaHC(object) coef(std) #>  complaints  privileges    learning      raises    critical     advance  #>  0.67072520 -0.07342743  0.30887024  0.06981172  0.03119975 -0.18346445
